title: How to Make a "When I'm Feeling Down" Candy Mix

steps.headline: Grind the banana, green apple, grape, orange and cherry Runts and put them into your bowl.
Grind the Nerds and add them in with the Runts.
Grind the strawberry PEZ and orange PEZ and add them to your mixture.
Grind the Watermelon Pop Rocks and add them to the mix.
Grind the SweeTart Rolls and add them into the mix.
Open your Fun Dip packet, and pour the powder into the mixture.
steps.description: Put the sugar stick aside (you will use this later). Mix well.

steps.headline: Sit down, relax and use the Fun Dip stick as you normally would, but instead of the Fun Dip, use the new mix!

text: Gather all ingredients.  Grind the banana, green apple, grape, orange and cherry Runts and put them into your bowl.  Grind the Nerds and add them in with the Runts. Mix well. Grind the strawberry PEZ and orange PEZ and add them to your mixture. Once again, mix well. Grind the Watermelon Pop Rocks and add them to the mix. Mix well. Grind the SweeTart Rolls and add them into the mix. Mix well. Open your Fun Dip packet, and pour the powder into the mixture. Put the sugar stick aside (you will use this later). Mix well. Lastly, mix all ingredients well.  Sit down, relax and use the Fun Dip stick as you normally would, but instead of the Fun Dip, use the new mix!  Finished.
